help:
**VCLogBot Help**

This bot provides a VC (voice/video chat) leveling system for your server!

**How it works:**
- Earn levels by spending time in voice or video calls.
- Each new level requires more time in calls to achieve.
- Most features are automatic—just join a call and start leveling up!

**Commands:**
- `/stats` — View your own VC stats and level progress.
- `/leaderboard` — See the top 10 users with the most VC time.

Enjoy chatting and see who climbs the leaderboard!
stats_max_level: - You have reached the max level!
stats_sessions:
- Total sessions: **{count}**
- Avg session: **{avg}**
- Longest session: **{max}**
